title: Windows 10 installation issue
body:
Hello.
Can't install this on Windows 10 x64bit from some reason.
The error i get is - lerna ERR! npm ERR! Can't install C:\Users\amahfuda\AppData\Roaming\npm\node_modules\remixd\node_modules\web3\packages\web3-eth-iban: Missing package name

Details:
C:\Windows\System32>npm install -g remixd
